sqlMap.sql: REPLY_NUM, BOARD_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, R_CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT REPLY_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS REPLY_NUM FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_NUM, BOARD_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, R_CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME) VALUES(#reply_num#, #board_num#, #member_num#, #r_content#, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REPLY SET R_CONTENT=#r_content#, MODIFY_TIME=SYSDATE WHERE REPLY_NUM=#reply_num#
sqlMap.select: SELECT R.REPLY_NUM, R.BOARD_NUM, R.MEMBER_NUM, R.R_CONTENT, R.CREATE_TIME, R.MODIFY_TIME, M.MEMBER_ID FROM REPLY R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NUM = R.MEMBER_NUM WHERE R.BOARD_NUM=#board_num# ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
